product_name: MACMini Gently Off Wipes + Micellar Water Makeup Remover Wipes
summary: SummaryMAC Mini Gently Off Wipes + Micellar Water Makeup Remover Wipes are biodegradable* wipes that remove makeup, cleanse, balance and hydrate. Soap- and alcohol-free. Appropriate for sensitive skin.
details: DetailsBenefits30 biodegradable* makeup remover wipes and formulaImmediately moisturizes and balances skin with an instant boost of hydrationSkin feels plumped and nourishedPurifies skin and gently removes makeup, smudges, dirt and oilLeaves skin feeling clean and refreshed with a radiant, healthy glowOphthalmologist testedDermatologist-testedDoes not cause acneSuitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin and eyes*Biodegradable wipes in sanitary landfill according to ASTM D5511 StandardFeaturesMakeup off. Skincare on.Gently wipe the day away with the formula designed with your skin and the environment in mindGently Off Wipes + Micellar Water makeup remover wipes are super-saturated with good-for-skin ingredients in a biodegradable* formula and fabricThese non-bleached wipes made of 100% cellulose-derived fibres are infused with saline and micellar water to delicately remove makeup, dirt and oil while instantly adding moisture to balance skinQuickly and luxuriously cleanse, plump and refresh your complexion - no rinsing needed - then simply toss out the towelette*Biodegradable wipes in sanitary landfill according to ASTM D5511 StandardFormulated WithoutDrying AlcoholSynthetic ColorParabensSulfatesPhthalatesFormaldehyde DonorsSodium Lauryl SulfateSodium LaurethsulfateTriclosanD&C Yellow No. 11OxybenzoneSynthetic Microbeads 5mm Or SmallerItem 2587733How To UseRemove makeup remover wipe from sealed package and sweep over face and eyes to wipe away makeup, erase mistakes or refresh skin. Rinsing not required.Dispose after use; do not flush.Reseal lid to keep towelettes fresh.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Hypnea Musciformis (Algae) Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride, Propanediol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Remove makeup remover wipe from sealed package and sweep over face and eyes to wipe away makeup, erase mistakes or refresh skin. Rinsing not required.Dispose after use; do not flush.Reseal lid to keep towelettes fresh.

reviews.headline: Best wipes ever!
reviews.comments: No clue how these have any negative comments - absolute must have in my holy grails! Removes a full face easy. Stays moist throughout.

reviews.headline: I hate this product and its odor
reviews.comments: Why can't MAC bring back the makeup remover wipes in the white package and a light and lovely scent. I used to shop MAC and buy more than expected if I were there for more wipes. Frankly, the pink ones STINK.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!!!!
reviews.comments: These are absolutely amazing at removing makeup without drying out your face. Used to use Clinique but these are so much better!!!!

reviews.headline: Great wipes, hydrating
reviews.comments: love these, they're really saturated with cleanser and get the job done

reviews.headline: Number One Face wipes
reviews.comments: It's ridiculous that they have a low rating. People that have obviously never gone through other face wipes are missing out. These immediately feel soothing and hydrating. Amazing at taking off all makeup, even waterproof. Better than any Mass brand or even Prestige. They should be carried in-line at all Ulta locations.

reviews.headline: love this my new fave product
reviews.comments: finally found makeup wipes that dont burn my face! these wipes works really well with my super senstive skin. i like how these wipes dont leave your skin feeling dry but hydrated.

reviews.headline: Bring back the original wipes!
reviews.comments: Even though these Mac wipes are pricey, the original ones smelled so good they were stretchy. They were the perfect amount of moisture to effectively remove your make up and make your face feel glowing. These new wipes down to the scent absolutely suck! Please bring back the original!!!

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: Don't know why this has low ratings. These definitely worked for me.

reviews.headline: Not Good
reviews.comments: These are nowhere as good as the original Mac wipes. You might as well use a baby wipe bc these are not kind to the skin and do hardly anything to remove makeup.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Works wonderful! Love it.

reviews.headline: The worst makeup wipes
reviews.comments: These do not remove your makeup. They leave your face feeling tight and sticky.

reviews.headline: Best Wipes Ever !!!
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin, everything i put in my face i always have bad reaction, but this wipes thank God this wipes work really good in my face !!! I recommended this product everyone with dry skin and sensitive skin

reviews.headline: DO NOT USE!
reviews.comments: I experienced an allergic reaction just from wiping off lipstick swatches while in the store. My skin immediately broke out into itchy hives, and was itchy for several hours. I wouldn't ever recommend this to anyone to use on their face, eye area or anywhere on their body. Please be careful.

reviews.headline: Don't waste ur money
reviews.comments: I bought these thinking they would be better than ur typical makeup Ôøºwipe, since they come from an actual makeup company. Totally wrong! 2x the price as Neutrogena Ôøºones, and take twice as long to get ur makeup off. Feels like i'm just rubbing and rubbing without anything actually coming off. Better off using a baby wipe than using these

reviews.headline: They work
reviews.comments:
I'm actually surprised to read how many poor reviews these wipes have.  I've used different brands of mincellar wipes and they mostly all irritate my face or cause me to breakout.  These are gentle, get the job done, leave my face feeling clean and on top of it all smell good.  I would disagree with the reviews that say these wipes are rough on the skin. 
I wish they were a little more affordable and just a tad bit larger.  Will continue purchasing these.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: We have been using these for 2 years now for dance makeup removal. One of the only wipes ever hat can take off the Clinique wet/dry liner that lasts for days. They are larger sheets and smell wonderful.

reviews.headline: Best for the Senstive
reviews.comments: I am shocked that these have such bad reviews on Ulta.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this product again
reviews.comments: The wipes are super rough on the face and they do not feel very moisturized and do not completely remove makeup from face unless you use a couple or scrub really hard! Sorry Mac but please do better

reviews.headline: Work really well
reviews.comments: Firstly they don't irritate my skin or turn my face red. Removes my waterproof eye makeup very well. I'm impressed üëèüèª

reviews.headline: Best so far
reviews.comments: These work VERY well. They are very "wet" and gentle. Effectively removes all my waterproof eye makeup no problem, also they don't make my skin red. Very pleased.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm actually surprised to read how many poor reviews these wipes have.  I've used different brands of mincellar wipes and they mostly all irritate my face or cause me to breakout.  These are gentle, get the job done, leave my face feeling clean and on top of it all smell good.  I would disagree with the reviews that say these wipes are rough on the skin. 
I wish they were a little more affordable and just a tad bit larger.  Will continue purchasing these.
faceoff_positive.headline: They work

faceoff_negative.comments:
I'm not sure how the packaging for these wipes made it past testing, but this is the worst packaging for any wipes that I've ever purchased, and definitely not representative of MAC quality. I should return these. The wipes are fine. I do struggle to remove Anastasia Beverly Hills Dipbrow (wand applicator), but I don't really expect a wipe to get that off. Usually for mascara, eyeliner, and brow makeup, I add a dual phase makeup remover to the wipe for more cleaning power. I use wipes to clean my face because I'm too busy and tired to do a face washing routine. 

With these wipes, it's a packaging issue. I want to buy the MAC bulk wipes in the good package, but Ulta unfortunately doesn't carry those, not even just to ship.  So I would need to go to yet another store.
faceoff_negative.headline: I've never left a 1 star review, especially not for MAC

rollup.name: Mini Gently Off Wipes + Micellar Water Makeup Remover Wipes
